availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henderson County, Kentucky, farmer. Georgia native. Married to Clementine Marks Crowley in Henderson County, Kentucky, on July 28, 1834. Father of William Decator Crowley, Thomas Crowley, Edmund J. Crowley, Benjamin F. Crowley, Isaiah Crowley, Mary A. Crowley, H. D. Crowley, and Virginia G. Crowley. Farmer in Henderson County in 1850. Employed Horace White as a shoemaker in Henderson County in 1850. Farmer in Henderson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, District 2, p. 310B-311A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Division 1, p. 123.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Henderson County Marriages, Film #001944390, p. 45.
